data.title: Dungen presents The Adventures of Prince Achmed
data.meta_description: In their first composition for film, the critically-acclaimed Stockholm-based band Dungen presents a new mystical and vibrant live score for the animated film The Adventures of Prince Achmed, created by pioneering animator Lotte Reiniger in 1926. Building on the band’s signature blend of psychedelic rock with Swedish folk music, the score’s instrumentals are moody, evocative, and brimming with life, reinventing the experience of one of the great classics of animation. Tickets $10.
data.meta_site_name: The J. Paul Getty in Los Angeles
data.text:
GETTY CENTER

Harold M. Williams Auditorium

In their first composition for film, the critically-acclaimed Stockholm-based band Dungen presents a new mystical and vibrant live score for the animated film The Adventures of Prince Achmed, created by pioneering animator Lotte Reiniger in 1926. Building on the band's signature blend of psychedelic rock with Swedish folk music, the score's instrumentals are moody, evocative, and brimming with life, reinventing the experience of one of the great classics of animation. Tickets $10.
